Token.Abstract: The AFNetworking-URITemplate category provides methods for the AFHTTPClient class that support URI template expansion of relevant methods.
Create a NSMutableURLRequest using template expansion from a NSDictionary.

Parameter.Name: method
Parameter.Abstract: The metod type, e.g. GET, POST, PUT etc

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: The path to be expanded, e.g. @"/api/rnr/product/{productId}/rating/{rating}

Parameter.Name: HTTPHeaders
Parameter.Abstract: The headers will be merged with any default headers set in the http client. Will override any existing default value.

Parameter.Name: HTTPBody
Parameter.Abstract: The body to send in the request. Some methods does not use the body, e.g. GET

Parameter.Name: URIVariables
Parameter.Abstract: Template URI variables will used as keys to get the replacement variable from this dictionary.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A mutable url request that be be used by the http client to make requests.

Token.Abstract: Create a NSMutableURLRequest using template expansion from a variable argument list (variadic).

Parameter.Name: method
Parameter.Abstract: The metod type, e.g. GET, POST, PUT etc

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: The path to be expanded, e.g. @"/api/rnr/product/{productId}/rating/{rating}

Parameter.Name: HTTPHeaders
Parameter.Abstract: The headers will be merged with any default headers set in the http client. Will override any existing default value.

Parameter.Name: HTTPBody
Parameter.Abstract: The body to send in the request. Some methods does not use the body, e.g. GET

Parameter.Name: URIVariable
Parameter.Abstract: Variable arguments list that will replace the URI variables. Must be nil terminated.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A mutable url request that be be used by the http client to make requests.

Token.Abstract: Create GET request using dictionary variable expansion and add it to the operation queue.
Token.Declaration: - (void)getPath:(NSString *)path success:(void ( ^ ) ( AFHTTPRequestOperation *operation , id responseObject ))success failure:(void ( ^ ) ( AFHTTPRequestOperation *operation , NSError *error ))failure URIVariablesDict:(NSDictionary *)URIVariables

Token.Abstract: Create GET request using variable argument list expansion and add it to the operation queue.
Token.Declaration: - (void)getPath:(NSString *)path success:(void ( ^ ) ( AFHTTPRequestOperation *operation , id responseObject ))success failure:(void ( ^ ) ( AFHTTPRequestOperation *operation , NSError *error ))failure URIVariables:(NSString *)URIVariable, ...

Token.Abstract: Expand a path or string using dictionary variable expansion.

Parameter.Name: URIVariables
Parameter.Abstract: Template URI variables will used as keys to get the replacement variable from this dictionary.

Token.Abstract: Expand a path or string using variable argument list expansion.

Parameter.Name: URIVariable
Parameter.Abstract: Variable arguments list that will replace the URI variables. Must be nil terminated.
